file_content.text: [An elaborate script is carved into the stone. You scan it and let your datapad translate.]
These are the words of Vepon-Du, Mystic and master of nothing.
This day I shall step from the Step of Harmony, my essence, my love, my life spilt.
It is my death my visions scream for. My life that, if spared, will destroy Voss.
Learn my words and know what it is to be Voss. I see my own death, and I give all that I cherish.
I am Voss. I do what must be done.
